snippet: Shares of telecom services, consumer staples and utilities companies were down sharply, while health care stocks led the gainers.
abstract: Stocks fall broadly, including telecommunications and utilities shares, ending three-day rally.
lead_paragraph: Shares of telecom services, consumer staples and utilities companies were down sharply, while health care stocks led the gainers.

headline.print_headline: A Three-Day Winning Streak Ends on Wall Street
